item.title: Rust Tickler 3 - Huntress CTF 2025 Reverse Engineering Writeup
item.author: sir_xxxx@protonmail.com (XeroExecute Blog)
item.description: Complete walkthrough of Rust Tickler 3, a multi-stage Rust reverse engineering challenge from Huntress CTF 2025. Covers dynamic analysis, memory extraction, custom PRNG XOR cipher, and AES-256-CBC decryption techniques.
